meanings.sent1: The raver danced all night at the rave.
meanings.sent2: The music at the rave attracted many ravers.
meanings.sent3: The raver wore colorful clothes to the rave.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of people, the raver stood out like a shining star at the rave.
meanings.sent5: The energetic raver brought life to the dance floor at the rave.

meanings.sent1: She loves to raver every weekend.
meanings.sent2: They raver together at every music festival.
meanings.sent3: Let's raver under the neon lights tonight!
meanings.sent4: He tends to raver until the break of dawn.
meanings.sent5: Ravering with friends always brings joy and excitement.
